full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN SKYONG MTHU RTZAL CHEN PO GZHI BDAG GI GNYAN PO GSOL MCHOD BKRA SHIS CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES PA BSTAN SKYONG MTHU RTZAL CHEN PO GZHI BDAG GNYAN PO'I GSOL MCHOD BKRA SHIS CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOB BU DGE BSGOS DGE SLONG NOR BU BZANG PO, DBU MDZAD DGE SLONG BLO BZANG YAR 'PHEL, DGE BSGOS DGE SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS RDO RJE'I SOGS DON GNYER CAN MANG POS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SKYABS GNAS DAM PA RJE BTZUN T'A RA N'A THA'I GANG DE NYID KYI ZHABS 'BRIING BA AIR TAI NI CHING BI SHI THU MED GENG TI YANG CHI'I SKU SKYES BLO BZANG BSTAN DAR GYIS SBYAR BAS DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
